Atma and Psuedo heard the call.

"Parylisis! Good! We left that skunky trash KitKat, we refuse to follow
someone who doesn't let you have an opinion, we only listen to
Blackarachnia!" Atma says back to Parylsis...
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 17, 2000 2:17 PM
Subject: Re: New Suit of Armor


>
> OOC: Well, looks like that pesky Hurricane has passed me by....
>
>     Aracnia looked up to see Inferno march down the corridor like a
soldier.
> She couldnt belive what an idiot he was, but she was glad to have him on
her
> side. He came closer, stopped, saluted, and stood tall.
>     "Royalty! I have come to inform you that Rampage awaits your arrival.
The
> ship is up and running and armed." He said, not stumbling over words and
> being very tact.
>     Aracnia shighed. " Excellent, we are beginning the moving process now.
> Unfortuetly, Kitkats groups has declined my offer. I guess the bunker will
> have to remain empty." She said looking around.
>     Inferno then looked around. THe bunker was big, but the ship was much
> better. "Shall I do anything for you, my Queen?"
>     Aracnia thought a moment. "Yes, take the three Maximal prisoners to
the
> ship with you. Aerostreak, Paralysis, and when Tarantulas gets back, will
> help move the important equitment on a transport."
>     Inferno nodded and went to the brig to fetch the three Maximal
prisoners.
> In the meantime, Aracnia called Quickstrike and Darkmouse.
>     "Quickstrike, Darkmouse, report to the command room now. I want you
two
> to go to the ship while were moving. Got it?"
>     She turned to Paralysis, "Get Venomus and Solo, Atma, and Pursudeo on
the
> Comm too, I want them here!"
>     Paralysis nodded and did as he was told.
>
>
>
